title: [Health] Scientists have found being overweight and having classes I and II obesity compared with having a normal BMI at a mean age of 40 years were associated with a statistically significantly higher cumulative morbidity score and health care costs across older adulthood

[Health] E. Coli enzyme that copies DNA might make more mistakes in zero gravity, new study finds. Because the enzyme made more transcription errors when exposed to microgravity, the researchers think our bodies' ability to maintain the integrity of our DNA may be hampered by spaceflight.
